## Stacked bar plot for age distribution by gender

```{r}
bar_plot_age_gender <- dat_aug_03 |> 
  ggplot(aes(x = Age, 
             fill = Sex)) +
  geom_bar(position = "stack", 
           stat = "count", 
           alpha = 0.7) +
  labs(title = "Overview of age and gender repartition for patients with cyrrhosis",
       x = "Age Group",
       y = "Count") +
  scale_fill_manual(values = c("Male" = "darkblue", "Female" = "red")) +
  theme_minimal()

```

```{r}
bar_plot_age_gender
```
